attr.title: Fire Boy
attr.desc:
This is bob, Bob says you will like this game. Bob was captured by a group of scientists, Now he's trying to escape!

Submit your runs! https://www.speedrun.com/Fire_Boy

FEATURES:
♦ 3 Chapters  
♦ A ton of scientist 
♦ Bob
attr.desc_md:
This is bob!

![bob](https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzE3ODgwNjU1LnBuZw==/original/J0gOKH.png)

"Bob says you will like this game"
Bob was captured by a group of scientists
Now he's trying to escape

[Submit your runs!](https://www.speedrun.com/Fire_Boy)

FEATURES:
*  3 Chapters  
*  A ton of scientist 
*  Bob
attr.inst: Install the game from https://dtrgames.itch.io/fire-boy and place the Fire Boy.pck in the gamedata dir.
attr.inst_md: Install the game from [itch.io](https://dtrgames.itch.io/fire-boy) and place the Fire Boy.pck in the gamedata dir.
